video.title: Velvet
video.synopsis: In 1950s Spain, the heir to a fashion house romances a beautiful seamstress who works for the company, despite the objections of his family.

episodes.synopsis: When Don Rafael presents the latest collection of his fashion house, his son Alberto returns home from his studies abroad.
episodes.title: Butterfly Wings

episodes.synopsis: Ana and Alberto learn Don Rafael has died. Now the managing director of Velvet, Alberto has to share his inheritance with Do√±a Gloria and Patricia.
episodes.title: The Seamstress

episodes.synopsis: Velvet is on the verge of bankruptcy. Don Gerardo, a family friend, offers to save Velvet if Alberto agrees to marry his daughter Cristina.
episodes.title: Stay Away From Me

episodes.synopsis: Alberto hopes that the new collection will be a major success so he can pay off Don Gerardo and break his engagement to Cristina.
episodes.title: Nothing Is That Easy

episodes.synopsis: Alberto pursues his affair with Ana, Pedro's girlfriend falls for Alberto's assistant, and Luisa pays a high price for Don Francisco's support.
episodes.title: The Designer

episodes.synopsis: Ana and Cristina search for the perfect gift for Alberto's birthday. Rita is finding it hard to cover for her sister Clara, who's cheating on Pedro.
episodes.title: Between Two Women

episodes.synopsis: When Alberto and Ana join Ra√∫l on a trip to Paris, Cristina shows up unexpectedly. To escape Don Francisco's harassment, Luisa turns to his wife.
episodes.title: Paris

episodes.synopsis: Back from Paris, Ana feels certain that Cristina is Alberto's true love. Meanwhile, Do√±a Blanca discovers Max's true identity.
episodes.title: The Day After

episodes.synopsis: As the wedding approaches, Alberto sees Ana with another man and has to choose between her and Cristina. Luisa's husband, Juan, gets sick again.
episodes.title: Alberto's Choice

episodes.synopsis: Ana refuses to marry Alberto in a secret ceremony. Ra√∫l returns, but a last-minute setback could endanger the fashion show.
episodes.title: The Big Day

episodes.synopsis: Ana is ready to fight for Alberto at all costs. After her success at the fashion show, Clara gets an interesting offer.
episodes.title: The Remains of the Shipwreck

episodes.synopsis: Don Emilio, the head of the sales staff, is seriously ill. Clara wants to start a career as a model, but things don't go as planned.
episodes.title: The Visitor

episodes.synopsis: Grace of Monaco visits Velvet. Cristina surprises Alberto with a party at the country club and learns things about Ana she never expected.
episodes.title: Blue Velvet

episodes.synopsis: When Cristina sees Alberto and Ana together, her worst fears seem to be confirmed. Clara expects Mateo to take her to the wedding of the year.
episodes.title: Compassionate Lies

episodes.synopsis: The day before the wedding, Cristina's dress disappears, and Ana must do her best to save the ceremony. Tensions between Max and Do√±a Blanca continue.
episodes.title: Night of the Queen

episodes.synopsis: The big day has come, and Cristina has to approve the new dress Ana made overnight. Alberto receives a mysterious letter.
episodes.title: Countdown

episodes.synopsis: Upon returning from his honeymoon, Alberto learns that his brother-in-law has taken charge of both the family business and the gallery.
episodes.title: The Night of Pins

episodes.synopsis: When Airsa airlines orders uniforms for their crew, Alberto makes a revolutionary proposal; Pedro's big lie threatens to push Rita into Adolfo's arms.
episodes.title: The Return Flight

episodes.synopsis: Ana designs uniforms for an airline; Enrique hires a new designer behind Alberto's back; Patricia teaches Do√±a Gloria a lesson she won't forget.
episodes.title: Days of Gloria

episodes.synopsis: Alberto struggles to accept Ana's relationship with Carlos. Ra√∫l returns and must open Cristina's eyes to the truth to clear his good name.
episodes.title: To Sew and to Sing

episodes.synopsis: Alberto decides to take Ana along to New York to help him close the deal; when the gallery suffers a big financial setback, Alberto holds an auction.
episodes.title: Who Bids Higher?

episodes.synopsis: Alberto and Ana arrive in New York, counting on their presentation's success, but when things get complicated, the gallery's future hangs by a thread.
episodes.title: New York, New York

episodes.synopsis: Alberto prepares to make an announcement; now that Rita is single, Pedro yearns to deny his affair with Rosa Mar√≠a and to confess his love for Rita.
episodes.title: In the Air

episodes.synopsis: On Christmas Eve, holiday cheer illuminates Velvet, but as staffers head to their villages and families, some, like Ana and Don Emilio, remain alone.
episodes.title: White Christmas

episodes.synopsis: As always, the Twelfth Day is the busiest day of the year; Alberto's conflict with Enrique seems to be resolved, but he and Ana still have issues.
episodes.title: Twelfth Night

episodes.synopsis: The new uniforms are unveiled. Cristina learns Alberto is cheating, and he gets shocking news of his own. Do√±a Blanca confronts ghosts from the past.
episodes.title: The Moment of Truth

episodes.synopsis: Ana has unfinished business with Carlos; madly in love, Pedro and Rita ponder a step forward; Luisa returns to the radio with a case of stage fright.
episodes.title: Today Is the Day of Love

episodes.synopsis: Alberto savors time with his mother, who hides the fact that they must soon part; Ana and Carlos suffer over their breakup.
episodes.title: Goodbyes

episodes.synopsis: Isabel's departure leaves a hole in Alberto's life, forcing him to grow; as Rita and Pedro's wedding draws near, the lovebirds face new challenges.
episodes.title: A Wedding and a Funeral

episodes.synopsis: Patricia loses corporate power. Cristina refuses to let go. Pedro and Rita have unfinished business. Esteban wins Ra√∫l's trust. Alberto is honored.
episodes.title: Man of the Year

episodes.synopsis: Cristina and B√°rbara pitch a new product line. Pedro learns a relative is coming to town. A business disaster devastates Ra√∫l and ousts a Velvet exec.
episodes.title: To Be or Not to Be

episodes.synopsis: Ra√∫l and Ana mesh their talents. Mateo vets secretarial candidates. Rita and Pedro's guest arrives. Alberto toils to give Ana a special birthday gift.
episodes.title: And Many Happy Returns

episodes.synopsis: Ra√∫l and Ana's collaboration suffers a setback. Cristina steps up her efforts to thwart Alberto's annulment plans. An admirer gives Patricia leverage.
episodes.title: Two Men and a Pacifier

episodes.synopsis: Luc√≠a starts her new job. Luisa visits during her tour. Alberto asks Ana to take a big step with him, and later makes a risky bet on Velvet's future.
episodes.title: Place Your Bets

episodes.synopsis: Enrique's name is cleared and his help is needed. Rita wins Luc√≠a's respect. Patricia finds a way to keep Jon√°s quiet. Cristina drops a bombshell.
episodes.title: Comebacks

episodes.synopsis: Cristina accomplishes a mission. Luc√≠a becomes suspicious of her father. V√≠ctor unintentionally inspires jealousy in two men. Ana goes missing.
episodes.title: The Wait

episodes.synopsis: Patricia and Valent√≠n progress quickly. Rita develops a medical worry. Cristina's revenge against Ana threatens others. Mateo runs into an old flame.
episodes.title: Day and Night

episodes.synopsis: A fit of anger sends Cristina to the hospital. Valent√≠n's mother drives Patricia crazy. Alberto receives a tempting offer. Michelle gets a scoop.
episodes.title: Coup de Theatre

episodes.synopsis: Alberto plays hardball with Patricia to get her shares. Cristina spirals out of control. Rita's obsession strains her marriage. Patricia feels torn.
episodes.title: Don't Say Goodbye

episodes.synopsis: V√≠ctor visits Cristina in the hospital at her request. The doctor gives Pedro worrying news. A game changer is revealed on Patricia's wedding day.
episodes.title: An Ocean Away

episodes.synopsis: Patricia gives Valent√≠n an ultimatum. A visitor lifts Pedro's spirits. Rita and Pedro get their test results. Ana seeks help from her ex, Carlos.
episodes.title: In Suspence

episodes.synopsis: Carlos re-enters Ana's daily life. Ana falls ill. Enrique meets with Cafiero behind Mateo's back. Ra√∫l warns Mateo not to lose Clara in his grief.
episodes.title: And Life Goes On ...

episodes.synopsis: Carlos offers to be Ana's protector. Cafiero introduces the new director, who promptly shakes things up. Someone from Ra√∫l's past begs for his help.
episodes.title: Winds of Change

episodes.synopsis: Marco asks Enrique to help him oust Cristina. The police question Ra√∫l. Mateo is reunited with his estranged father. Clara gets cold feet.
episodes.title: Here's to the Bride and Groom?

episodes.synopsis: Ana works on a plan to revolutionize Velvet. One couple faces the challenges of parenthood, while another has separated. A penitent Cristina returns.
episodes.title: Welcome to the '60s

episodes.synopsis: Enzo will help Ana with her new project under the condition that Mateo returns. A mysterious woman arrives at Velvet with a secret in tow.
episodes.title: More Than a Pretty Face

episodes.synopsis: Cristina investigates information about Alberto. Pedro is tasked with giving some bad news to the employees. Jon√°s wants to be a tailor.
episodes.title: Tell Me Your Secret

episodes.synopsis: Things seem to be going well for Ana: she has a new business idea and Carlos is the perfect mate. Enrique and Valent√≠n are deceived by Patricia.
episodes.title: The Inner Enemy

episodes.synopsis: Carlos awaits Ana‚Äôs response. Pedro fights for his wife. Mateo has a surprise in store. Ra√∫l becomes upset upon reading the news.
episodes.title: A Difficult Decision

episodes.synopsis: Ana discovers those responsible for the sabotage and threatens them. Mateo supports an overwhelmed Clara. Humberto and Ra√∫l seem to finally get along.
episodes.title: The Moment of Truth

episodes.synopsis: Everyone is concerned for Rita. Ana‚Äôs store is about to have its grand opening. Carlos prepares for the wedding. Mateo receives a mysterious note.
episodes.title: At Play

episodes.synopsis: While Ana receives an award in Italy for her new successful collection, Marco organizes a fashion show behind her back. Mateo gets info on Alberto.
episodes.title: Pr√™t-√†-Porter

episodes.synopsis: The day of Ana's wedding, Clara and Rita anxiously wait to hear from Mateo in New York. Patricia suffers the consequences of covering for Enrique.
episodes.title: Unexpected Gifts

episodes.synopsis: After finding out that Alberto is alive, Ana wonders why he has not contacted her all this time. Ra√∫l helps Jon√°s clean up his image.
episodes.title: And Then He Came

episodes.synopsis: Mateo makes a confession to Clara, Ra√∫l finally finds a romance of his own, Rita has a scare, and Alberto and Ana get their happy ending at last.
episodes.title: The Big Day II
